text:
@NYGovCuomo You know that consortium of buying that you announced? Do you know that this is what #M4A would do on a regular basis to cut enough waste out of the $3.7T/y healthcare system to pay for our entire military budget?

Hello?

How was #WatchMeHike?

https://t.co/gz29T8uUJz
